0.1.0.name: wordpress/pb-tweet
0.1.0.description:
PB-Tweet allow you to easily display your latest tweet in an easily customizable banner at the top of your website, enabling you to connect your visitors to more of your web-presence.

PB-Tweet works in all browsers, and can be customized through simple css to match your sites design.
